Suukie walked up.. "hi boss, what's the toss?..." he asked.....Suukie stared
at Tigerhwk.....then looked back to Liono..... "nice roar, it scared the
animal i was standing next to, a boar!...." he said.....Suukie walked up and
over to the Maximal base.. "how are you today, Magmademonicon, nice to see
yaa again hater of Predicon!..." Suukie said to thin air......

> Liono: Tocar I need you to go recover that stasis Pod and Round up the
> maximals ::hands him liono's crest:: show this to them its my seal and
give
> it to Key if I don't return I just remembered I have to go it alone from
here
> ::Walks down to the beach toward his private spot:: This is it the Lion
> Memorial ::Looks at the rocks shaped like a lion. ::kneeks and Lights 4
> candles and Prays:: I sorry ramulas and to all my other friends that died
> because of me I had finished hellbeast and held back. I Guess choices were
> made and I choose some bad ones.
>
> Matrix: Liono they choose to be here and they died fighting for something
and
> someone they believed in. Now you have to believe in yourself I've taught
you
> all I can
>
> Liono: ::Stands and Walks towards the pred base::
> RRRRRRRRROOOOOOOOOOAAAAAAAAAAAAAARRRRRRRRRRRRRRRR ::all the birds rise out
of
> the trees:: HELLBEAST IT THE END THAT'S NOT ME I'M NOT OPTIMUS PRIME AND
I'M
> NOT HOT ROD ::WALKS TOWARDS THE PRED BASE IN A CHANGED DEMEANOR::
HELLBEAST
> YOU ONCE ASKED MY DO I WASTE MY TIME FIGHTING A BATTLE THAT I KNOW I CAN'T
> WIN? ::LAUGHS WHOLE HEARTED::
> THE ANSWER IS SIMPLE AS THE CARRIER OF THE MATRIX I, AM REPRESENTATIVE OF
ALL
> LIFE AND ITS GRACE. THERE FOR I WILL NEVER GIVE UP I BELIEVE IN MYSELF AND
I
> BELIEVE MY DREAMS AND I CAN ACHIEVE THEM AND THE ONLY THING THAT'S STANDS
IN
> MY WAY IS YOU AND ALL THAT'S ABOUT TO CHANGE. SO HELLBEAST WHY DON'T YOU
GET
> OUT HERE AND TRY TO STOP ME OR IS IT THAT YOUR SO WEAK THAT YOU DON'T WANT
TO
> SHOW THE COUNCIL THAT YOU CAN'T HANDLE YOURSELF IN COMBAT. WELL, I'M
WAITING.
>
> Tigerhawk: He changed a lot and I think for the better.
